title: Mixed salad with grapefruit-yogurt dressing
ingredients: ['For the salad', '1/2 butterhead lettuce, sliced', '1 handful rocket leaves', '1 yellow pepper, sliced', '1 red pepper, sliced', '8 radishes, sliced', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons plain yogurt', '2 tablespoons grapefruit juice', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon honey', '2 teaspoons chopped chives', 'salt and pepper to taste']
